Title: Field Operations
Contents: [Header]= <value>
Assigns the given value to the selected values. Will attempt conversion to the value's data type.
[Header]+ <value>
Adds the number to the selected values, or appends text if that is the data type of the values.
[Header]- <value>
Subtracts the number from the selected values.
[Header]* <value>
Multiplies selected values by the number.
[Header]/ <value>
Divides the selected values by the number
[Header]% <value>
Gives the remainder when the selected values are divided by the number.
[Header]scale <factor> <center>
Multiplies the difference between the selected values and the center number by the factor number.
[Header]replace <search string> <replace string>
Interprets the selected values as text and replaces all occurances of the text to replace with the new text
[Header]replacex <search string> <replace string>
Interprets the selected values as text and replaces all occurances of the given regex with the replacement, supporting regex groups
[Header]max <value>
Returns the larger of the current value and number.
[Header]min <value>
Returns the smaller of the current value and number.
